docker.name: ENV
docker.raw: ENV GPG_KEYS     223D3A74B068ECA354DC385CE126833F9CF64915     7A2744A8A9AAF063C23EB7868EBE7DBE8D050EEF     82D8419BA697F0E7FB85916EE91287822FDB81B1     9056B710F1E332780DE7AF34CBAEBE39A46C4CA1     A57DAF81C1B69921F4BA8723A8DE0A4DB863A7C1     B7574789F5018690043E6DD9C212662E12F3E1DD     B8B301E6105DF628076BD92C5483E55897ABD9B9     DBCCD103B8B24F86FFAAB025C8BB472CD297D428     F067B8140F5DD80E1D3B5D92318242FE9A0B1183     FAA603D58B1BA4EDF65896D0ED340E0E6D545F97     C92604B0DEC5C62CFF5801E73D4683C24EDC64D1     294A395FFDC9FCF25A7E2BFDCF6FC99C2CC77782

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -xe     && for key in $GPG_KEYS; do         gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80 --recv-keys "$key" ||         gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://ipv4.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key" ||         gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://pgp.mit.edu:80 --recv-keys "$key" ;     done
docker.raw: RUN set -xe     && for key in $GPG_KEYS; do         gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80 --recv-keys "$key" ||         gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://ipv4.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key" ||         gpg --batch --keyserver hkp://pgp.mit.edu:80 --recv-keys "$key" ;     done

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -x 	&& curl -fSL https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/tomee/tomee-${TOMEE_VER}/apache-tomee-${TOMEE_VER}-${TOMEE_BUILD}.tar.gz.asc -o tomee.tar.gz.asc 	&& curl -fSL https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/tomee/tomee-${TOMEE_VER}/apache-tomee-${TOMEE_VER}-${TOMEE_BUILD}.tar.gz -o tomee.tar.gz 	&& gpg --batch --verify tomee.tar.gz.asc tomee.tar.gz 	&& tar -zxf tomee.tar.gz 	&& mv apache-tomee-${TOMEE_BUILD}-${TOMEE_VER}/* /usr/local/tomee 	&& rm -Rf apache-tomee-${TOMEE_BUILD}-${TOMEE_VER} 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomee.tar.gz*
docker.raw: RUN set -x 	&& curl -fSL https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/tomee/tomee-${TOMEE_VER}/apache-tomee-${TOMEE_VER}-${TOMEE_BUILD}.tar.gz.asc -o tomee.tar.gz.asc 	&& curl -fSL https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/tomee/tomee-${TOMEE_VER}/apache-tomee-${TOMEE_VER}-${TOMEE_BUILD}.tar.gz -o tomee.tar.gz 	&& gpg --batch --verify tomee.tar.gz.asc tomee.tar.gz 	&& tar -zxf tomee.tar.gz 	&& mv apache-tomee-${TOMEE_BUILD}-${TOMEE_VER}/* /usr/local/tomee 	&& rm -Rf apache-tomee-${TOMEE_BUILD}-${TOMEE_VER} 	&& rm bin/*.bat 	&& rm tomee.tar.gz*
